data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UChiWUkTA4YQ7kNvgHsY-z6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCcBH2PDu8oqtEZ4n_zmi-e7coIr7I0-Yf15Gzg7xYAEg&oe=66C9C237)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PXBIkkTUHT0Q7kNvgEibl9W&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBYzfnqa6fj7OHSEswor9mvCpQ6kcdj4DpLLElG5mT3FA&oe=66C9CFD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=heCBevrIC_wQ7kNvgHf9dZe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCF-Pha-RM7CcJWaEQ1vQ8KfKvH8B4gI7z1vtkQ3vkHww&oe=66C9BB09)
